class_description: These options are used with the contentsOfDirectory(at:includingPropertiesForKeys:options:) method.

params.param_description: An initial value for the structure composed as the bitwise OR of zero or more of the valid values.

Methods.method_description: Creates a directory enumeration options value.

Vars.var_description: An option to perform a shallow enumeration that doesn’t descend into directories.
An option to treat packages like files and not descend into their contents.
An option to skip hidden files.
